metadata.projectTitle: Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs)
metadata.title: Zynate Events Group paid $1667
metadata.message: Zynate Events Group has paid $1667 for your recent Phase 1 – Concept & Creative Direction for Marketing & Campaign Design for James Bond Look-Alike Cosplay Contest ($5,000 in 007 NFTs). This project has a remaining budget of $3334. Click here to view invoice details
